short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listens for messages and echos back the corresponding information about the given device

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Managed Chrome Device Information Messenger Extension is designed for users with managed Chrome devices, running client side JS, seeking to optimize their logging capabilities.  When deployed to the managed Chrome Devices, this extension allows users to access vital device information directly from their client side JS, empowering them to enhance their logs with essential details effortlessly.

Key Features:
Obtain crucial device information such as serial numbers, annotated locations, asset IDs, hostnames, and directory device IDs with ease. You can then use these details to enhance your logs with accurate and up-to-date device information, facilitating smoother troubleshooting and monitoring processes. Integration is seamless, and is just a matter of sending a message from your client side JS to the extension, with a simple interface, ensuring quick access to device details when needed.


Who Should Use This Extension?
This extension is specifically tailored for users with managed Chrome devices running client-side JavaScript. Whether you're an IT administrator, developer, or system analyst, if you rely on detailed device information for your workflows, this extension is essential for optimizing your logging capabilities.
